overview.description: Karnataka, located in southern India, is known for its ancient temples, coffee plantations, and coastal beaches. Established as a state on November 1, 1956, it features attractions like Mysuru and Hampi.

top_destinations.name: Mysuru
top_destinations.description: Famous for the Mysore Palace and Dasara festival.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit during Dasara; explore the palace at night.

top_destinations.name: Hampi
top_destinations.description: A UNESCO site with ancient ruins and temples.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Rent a bike; visit Virupaksha Temple.

top_destinations.name: Coorg
top_destinations.description: Known for coffee estates and scenic hills.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit Abbey Falls; carry rain gear.

culinary_delights.name: Mavalli Tiffin Rooms
culinary_delights.description: Famous for dosas and filter coffee.

culinary_delights.name: The Only Place
culinary_delights.description: Popular for continental and Indian dishes.

culinary_delights.name: Cafe Coffee Day
culinary_delights.description: Cozy spot for coffee and snacks.

culinary_delights.name: Nagarjuna
culinary_delights.description: Famous for seafood and Andhra-style meals.

culinary_delights.name: Truffles
culinary_delights.description: Offers a variety of international cuisine.

must_visit_spots.name: Mysore Palace
must_visit_spots.description: A historic palace with stunning architecture.

must_visit_spots.name: Hampi Ruins
must_visit_spots.description: Ancient ruins of the Vijayanagara Empire.

must_visit_spots.name: Gokarna Beach
must_visit_spots.description: A serene beach with spiritual significance.

must_visit_spots.name: Bandipur National Park
must_visit_spots.description: A wildlife sanctuary with tigers and elephants.
must_visit_spots.tip: Book a safari for the best experience.

must_visit_spots.name: Chikmagalur
must_visit_spots.description: Known for coffee plantations and Mullayanagiri peak.

must_visit_spots.name: Badami
must_visit_spots.description: Famous for rock-cut caves and temples.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit the Bhootnath Temple at sunset.

travel_essentials.how_to_reach: By road: Bengaluru is 500 km from Chennai (NH48, 8-9 hrs). By train: Bengaluru City connects major cities. By air: Kempegowda Airport (Bengaluru).
travel_essentials.tips: Carry light clothing; book accommodations in advance.
